title: Jordan Beachfront Break on the Gulf of Aqaba
description: Indulge in ultimate luxury at the InterContinental Aqaba (Resort Aqaba), an IHG Hotel, ideally located on a private beach overlooking the Gulf of Aqaba. Surrounded by white sand shores lapped by turquoise waters, this elegant oasis offers a palatial escape with Red Sea views. Part of the globally recognised InterContinental brand, the resort features a stretch of private beach, swimming pool, lavish spa, onsite fitness centre and five restaurants and bars.

title: Jordan City Break on the Gulf of Aqaba with Private Beach, Four Pools & Spa
description:
Experience the coastal charm of Jordan's Aqaba city with a five-star stay at this luxurious Mövenpick retreat. Savour the taste of the Middle East at one of three onsite eateries, including the renowned ocean-view Red Sea Grills, or enjoy a refreshing drink at the al fresco Fun Pub or the cosy Al Nafoura lobby bar.

Venture out to explore the historic city, with its ancient ruins and vibrant markets, or make the most of the hotel's private beach and take a dip in the Red Sea, home to some of the world's most stunning coral reefs. After a day of adventure, return to your plush sanctuary, where four sparkling pools and a relaxing spa await.

vendor_name: Mövenpick Resort & Spa Tala Bay Aqaba
title: Luxury Aqaba Mövenpick Oasis with Eight Restaurants & Bars, Four Pools & Private Beach
description:
Discover the magic of Jordan’s Red Sea coast at this five-star resort, a short drive from the heart of Aqaba. Mövenpick Tala Bay offers direct access to a private beach and a wealth of amenities, including four swimming pools with a lazy river and waterslide, kids' club and a fully equipped fitness centre. Unwind at the Zara Spa with its serene hydro pool, sauna and steam room, or take up a salsa dancing class.

With eight restaurants and bars to choose from, every craving is catered to - from indulgent buffet spreads at Najel to classic Italian at Casalingo. Sip cocktails and enjoy live entertainment at Siraj’s shisha terrace, or dance the night away at The Bop with a live DJ. Whether you're exploring the nearby ruins of Ayla, or venturing out to Petra or Wadi Rum, this Tala Bay retreat is the perfect base for your Jordanian journey.
location_description: Mövenpick Resort & Spa Tala Bay Aqaba
offer_address: Tala Bay Area, S Beach Hwy, Aqaba 77110, Jordan

title: Five-Star Enticing Kempinski Aqaba Escape on Shore of Famous Red Sea
description: Step into a Middle Eastern fantasy with a stay at the five-star Kempinski Hotel Aqaba Red Sea, set on the stunning white sands of Aqaba. Only a short beach stroll away from the iconic Red Sea, the luxurious hotel is also strategically positioned in the heart of the aquatic city - perfect for checking out the vibrant sights of Jordan. Explore world-class diving spots and pristine beaches, visit a traditional souk for delicious pastries and spices and marvel at the history and views of the famous sea on your doorstep. Relax with a wide array of international dining options, modern facilities and warm hospitality back at the hotel, a welcome respite after the hustle and bustle of the city.
